overview: At the end of WWII, Nazi officials spirited the living head of Adolf Hitler out of Germany to a hiding place in the South American country of Mandoras, in order to revive the Third Reich at a later date. By the 1960s, the time has come, so a top scientist is kidnapped in order to help keep Hitler alive.  This film is a re-edit of The Madmen of Mandoras released in theaters in 1963.
tagline: The most incredible plot to conquer the world!
title: They Saved Hitler's Brain
